attributes.action: Force the Government to relinquish Covid 19 emergency powers. We will not comply
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to show the numbers of Britons from all walks of life. To show we will not Comply. That we will publicly rebel if need be to show the government totalitarian tyrannical powers and useless measures are worth piss when this government can't stop near 1000 unvaxxed and illegal migrants coming in to be given 5* livings and digs. Enough is enough. Conservatives surrender the powers now or you will be crucified at the ballot box and never be like labour elected again!! Surrender now!
attributes.background: The government is overstepping its bounds now. We have seen no matter the change in tactics Covid-19 ebbs and flows no matter how many are vaxxed or how many measures/safety barriers are built. The nation needs to work and not be prevented by suits who get paid rich tithes from our suffering

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592632
